core_exploration.central_question: How does my voice sound when recorded and played back?
core_exploration.key_tension: The gap between internal voice perception and external audio reality
core_exploration.breakthrough_moment: The moment of hearing one's own voice objectively through recording
core_exploration.edge_of_understanding: Whether the recorded voice accurately represents how others hear them

conceptual_dna: Self-perception requires external feedback loops to achieve objectivity
Testing creates awareness of the gap between internal experience and external reality

bridge_potential.novel_synthesis: Using technology to create self-awareness feedback loops
bridge_potential.cross_domain_pattern: External measurement reveals internal blind spots

raw_essence: A simple experiment in self-perception through voice recording, representing the universal human curiosity about how we appear to others versus how we experience ourselves internally.
embedding_text: voice test recording self-perception audio feedback external reality internal experience objective awareness
